name: flogo-kafkabyte
title: Publish Kafka Byte message
description: Publish a Byte message to a kafka topic
author: Forked from Wendell Nichols <wnichols@tibco.com> by Andy Hampshire <ahampshi@tibco.com>

settings.name: brokerUrls
settings.description: The Kafka cluster to connect to

settings.name: topic
settings.description: The Kafka topic on which to place the message

settings.name: user
settings.description: If connecting to a SASL enabled port, the user id to use for authentication

settings.name: password
settings.description: If connecting to a SASL enabled port, the password to use for authentication

settings.name: trustStore
settings.description: If connecting to a TLS secured port, the directory containing the certificates representing the trust chain for the connection. This is usually just the CACert used to sign the server's certificate

input.name: brokerUrls
input.description: The Kafka cluster to connect to

input.name: topic
input.description: The Kafka topic on which to place the message

input.name: user
input.description: If connecting to a SASL enabled port, the user id to use for authentication

input.name: password
input.description: If connecting to a SASL enabled port, the password to use for authentication

output.name: partition
output.description: Documents the partition that the message was placed on

output.name: offset
output.description: Documents the offset for the message
